node1.PC_Text: There she is… The one, the only, the luminescent…. Luna!
node1.NPC_Response: That's kind of you, Annie. Nice to see you again.

A.PC_Text: Everything is going well! I am loving it here.
A.NPC_Response: Acme Tech is a great place to work.

A.PC_Text: I'm good! I'm having trouble sleeping recently though.
A.NPC_Response: Oh, I'm sorry to hear that. I'm sure that's frustrating.

A.PC_Text: I'm feeling super stressed! My parents are coming to visit this weekend and I haven't planned anything.  They can be so picky.
A.NPC_Response: Oh, that should be nice to see your parents though!

B.PC_Text: Do you know any nice restaurants in the area? I want to go buy some lunch.
B.NPC_Response: There are a few good places.  What kind of food do you like?

B.PC_Text: So what was your major in college?
B.NPC_Response: Oh, well that was some time ago! But I majored in business. What about you?

B.PC_Text: So, what was the last movie you watched that made you cry?
B.NPC_Response: Umm, I don't remember.  I don't usually cry at movies.

C.PC_Text: You too, Luna.  How have you been?
C.NPC_Response: I'm doing well. I'm looking forward to the weekend. I'm going camping for the first time!

C.PC_Text: Did you see what Fran is wearing today?
C.NPC_Response: Yes,  I think she looks lovely!

C.PC_Text: So, what kind of bonus did you get last year?
C.NPC_Response: I'm sorry… I don't think we are supposed to talk about that.

AA.PC_Text: Everyone is so friendly.  It's been great meeting so many new people.
AA.NPC_Response: I know! At my last job they ran out of desks so they put me on a different floor all by myself. It was so lonely.

AA.PC_Text: It's so much better than my last job as a zookeeper at the local zoo. I had to clean up whenever the monkeys went to the bathroom!
AA.NPC_Response: Oh no! I'm afraid of monkeys ever since I was a little kid and a monkey climbed out of a tree and stole my banana.

AA.PC_Text: Yea, I can see myself becoming president of the company by next year! I already made my business cards!
AA.NPC_Response: Wow, that would be impressive! I was supposed to be promoted at my last job but on the day of my promotion, the company went bankrupt.

AB.PC_Text: It is... but I'm planning on a nice hot  bath tonight to help me sleep.
AB.NPC_Response: That's a good idea! I used to have a bathtub but I left the water running and it crashed through my floor.

AB.PC_Text: It's my fault. I like watching horror movies right before bed time!
AB.NPC_Response: Oh no. Horror movies scare me ever since I accidentally watched one as a kid. I thought it was a Disney cartoon!

AB.PC_Text: It's a good thing actually! I think I am finally going to achieve my dream and become a vampire! I'm going to live forever!
AB.NPC_Response: One time at a local fair, a man sold me magic pills that he said would keep me young forever. I am pretty sure they were just chocolate M&M's though.

AC.PC_Text: Yea, it should be fun. I guess we can visit some of the museums.
AC.NPC_Response: That's a great idea! I would lend you my Art Museum pass but I lost my wallet on the way to work.

AC.PC_Text: I guess! You know families though. They can be such a pain! At least my brothers aren't coming, too!
AC.NPC_Response: Well, you're lucky you can see your brothers! My brother ran off to join the circus after college and we never heard from him again.

AC.PC_Text: What if you show them around? You would be a great tour guide! You can cancel your plans and pick them up, right?
AC.NPC_Response: Uhhh… well I am busy this week. And actually, I got 2 flat tires on my way to work this morning so I don't have a car now!

BA.PC_Text: I like everything! What do you recommend?
BA.NPC_Response: Well, my favorite is the local French restaurant. I used to love their cheeses but I developed a dairy allergy this year!

BA.PC_Text: I like anywhere that I can watch the kitchen as they make the food. I don't want them messing with my meal!
BA.NPC_Response: I worked in a restaurant like that.  I used to practice my juggling with the bread rolls until they fired me… something about  health codes.

BA.PC_Text: I only eat food that I can eat with my hands.  It’s not appropriate to carry weapons around, and forks are basically just tiny spears.
BA.NPC_Response: I see… Well, I think there is a good burger place around the corner. You don't need a fork for that!

BB.PC_Text: Oh, that's useful! I majored in software engineering.
BB.NPC_Response: That's a great field to be in.  I wanted to be an engineer but I checked the wrong box on my college applicatio!

BB.PC_Text: I majored in oceanography.  I love marine life and wanted to be a sea captain!
BB.NPC_Response: That's interesting! I'd love to work on a boat but I get sea sick just from swimming in a pool!

BB.PC_Text: I majored in knitting and basket weaving.  I think it has some serious potential to help me look cool when I become a grandmother.
BB.NPC_Response: Wow, I'm terrible at knitting! I tried making a sock once but it was so long, now I just wear it as a scarf!

BC.PC_Text: Oh really? Those romantic comedies always get me!
BC.NPC_Response: I'm more of an adventure type myself!

BC.PC_Text: What about that Disney movie where the cat got stuck in the tree?  It reminds me of my cat who passed away, Mr. Mittens!
BC.NPC_Response: I'm sorry about your cat… Cats never seem to like me. I think they know I am a dog person.

BC.PC_Text: TV shows? Books? Come on! You seem like the sensitive type to me! Just tell me how you feel.
BC.NPC_Response: I don't know what to say, Annie.

CA.PC_Text: Oh that sounds fun! I'm sure that will be relaxing.
CA.NPC_Response: Yea, It will be great to sleep under the stars!

CA.PC_Text: Sounds great! Can I come? I've never been!
CA.NPC_Response: Oh, sorry Annie. I'm going with my family and there's no more room in the tent.

CA.PC_Text: Oh, no! I've been watching Bears Attack! Recently on TV every night. I'd be terrified if I were you.
CA.NPC_Response: Thanks a lot, Annie! I don't think I'll be able to sleep tonight!

CB.PC_Text: I really like her shirt! That's a great shade of purple.
CB.NPC_Response: Yea, I had a dress just like it but the dry cleaners lost it!

CB.PC_Text: I love her shirt, but it would look better on me…
CB.NPC_Response: Well, umm...Maybe she will let you borrow it one day,

CB.PC_Text: I'm thinking of dying my hair purple like that! What do you think? It would look great for my new work ID.
CB.NPC_Response: I dyed my hair blue once for Halloween. The box said temporary but the dye stayed in my hair for 3 months! I had blue hair in my high school photos!

CC.PC_Text: OK, I am just curious.  I'd love to buy a new laptop with mine!
CC.NPC_Response: Yea, me too. I got a new one last month but  my dog knocked over a bowl of cereal on the keyboard and only the letters G and R will work now.

CC.PC_Text: Come on! I won't tell anyone. Just tell me if it's enough to buy that jet ski I've been wanting.
CC.NPC_Response: Sorry, Annie. I really don’t know...

CC.PC_Text: OK, so what can we talk about? Do you know any dirty jokes?
CC.NPC_Response: I don't like to tell jokes ever since my boyfriend left me to become a clown.
